statements: SELECT customer_id, transaction_date, transaction_amount, billing_description FROM billing_analysis;
SELECT * FROM billing_analysis WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT billing_description, transaction_amount FROM billing_analysis WHERE transaction_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, transaction_amount FROM billing_analysis ORDER BY transaction_amount DESC;
SELECT customer_id, AVG(transaction_amount) AS avg_transaction_amount FROM billing_analysis GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM billing_analysis WHERE customer_id = 123 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT customer_id FROM billing_analysis WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 ORDER BY customer_id ASC;
SELECT billing_description, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_amount FROM billing_analysis GROUP BY billing_description HAVING total_amount > 5000 ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS num_transactions FROM billing_analysis GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY num_transactions DESC;
SELECT AVG(transaction_amount) AS avg_amount, MIN(transaction_amount) AS min_amount, MAX(transaction_amount) AS max_amount FROM billing_analysis;
SELECT * FROM billing_patterns;
SELECT id, amount, payment_method FROM billing_patterns WHERE customer_id = 100;
SELECT customer_id, amount FROM billing_patterns WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT id, reason FROM abnormal_billing_practices WHERE timestamp < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM billing_patterns ORDER BY amount DESC, timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM billing_patterns WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM billing_patterns GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_amount > 2000;
SELECT customer_id, AVG(amount) AS avg_amount FROM billing_patterns GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY avg_amount DESC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS num_transactions FROM billing_patterns GROUP BY customer_id HAVING num_transactions > 5;
SELECT ap.customer_id, ap.reason, bp.amount FROM abnormal_billing_practices ap LEFT JOIN billing_patterns bp ON ap.customer_id = bp.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM BillingPatterns;
SELECT id, user_id, amount FROM BillingPatterns WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT amount, user_id, transaction_date FROM BillingPatterns WHERE amount > 100;
SELECT user_id, transaction_date FROM BillingPatterns ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM AbnormalBilling ORDER BY flagged_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM BillingPatterns WHERE user_id = 100 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM BillingPatterns GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS transaction_count FROM BillingAnalysis WHERE analyzed_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5;
SELECT * FROM BillingPatterns WHERE amount > 1000 AND transaction_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT user_id, reason FROM AbnormalBilling ORDER BY flagged_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_id FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT order_id, customer_id, order_date FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM products WHERE unit_price > 100;
SELECT customer_name, order_total FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name FROM customers WHERE customer_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM products WHERE unit_price > 50.00;
SELECT * FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM Customers;
SELECT invoice_id, invoice_amount FROM Invoices ORDER BY invoice_amount DESC;
SELECT customer_name, invoice_amount, invoice_date FROM Customers JOIN Invoices ON Customers.customer_id = Invoices.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM BillingAnalytics WHERE total_invoices > 5;
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM Customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT invoice_id, invoice_amount, invoice_date FROM Invoices WHERE invoice_amount > 1000 ORDER BY invoice_date ASC;
SELECT invoice_id, reason FROM AbnormalBilling WHERE created_at >= '2022-01-01' AND created_at < '2022-02-01';
SELECT customer_id, total_invoices, total_payments FROM BillingAnalytics WHERE total_invoices > 5 ORDER BY total_payments DESC;
